biomarkers.name: Blood Glucose
biomarkers.description: Measures the amount of glucose (sugar) in your blood.

biomarkers.name: Total Cholesterol
biomarkers.description: Measures all cholesterol in your blood.

biomarkers.name: Triglycerides
biomarkers.description: A type of fat in your blood that can increase risk of heart disease.

biomarkers.name: HbA1c
biomarkers.description: Measures your average blood glucose level over the past 2-3 months.

biomarkers.name: C-Reactive Protein
biomarkers.description: A marker of inflammation in the body.

biomarkers.name: TSH
biomarkers.description: Thyroid-stimulating hormone, which regulates thyroid function.
